request-cta.txt: The stay for <1>{{count}} cat</1> with <3>{{host}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{checkin}}</5> until <7>{{checkout}}</7> would in total cost
request-cta.txt_plural: The stay for <1>{{count}} cats</1> with <3>{{host}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{checkin}}</5> until <7>{{checkout}}</7> would in total cost

errors.action-error-header: Action could not be completed because of following error(s):
errors.update-number-fields: The field is blank, unchanged or the number is invalid!
errors.sign-out-error: There was a problem signing you out. Please try again in a minute.
errors.window-navigator: It appears there is a problem with your internet connection. Please check it and try again.
errors.500: There was a problem contacting the server. Try reloading the page in a minute. If the problem persists, please contact KattBNB support.
errors.401-password: This link has expired! You'll be redirected to request a new one.
errors.401: This session has expired! You will have to login again.
errors.google-error-1: Address not found! Please try again.
errors.google-error-2: There was a problem contacting the Google server. Try again in a minute. If the problem persists contact KattBNB support.
errors.index-no-host-1: This host does not exist! Please refresh the page.
errors.index-no-host-2: This host does not exist! Please search again to get updated results.
errors.captcha: You didn't input the captcha phrase correctly, please try again!
errors.unknown: We are currently updating our services or something went wrong. Please try back at a later time. If the problem still persists, please let us know and send us this timestamp: {{timestamp}}

alerts.no-match-address: It seems that the address you selected does not match your profile location. Are you sure you want to continue?

labels.captcha: Type the code you see above

explain-supplement: Letâ€™s say that your rate is 120 kr/day for one cat and supplement for a second cat is 35 kr/day. That means if you host one cat for three days your payment is 120 x 3 = 360 kr. Although if you agree to host two cats of the same owner for three days your payment is (120+35) x 3 = 465 kr

stripe.step-1-text: You made a host profile but have not provided us with your payment information. Without that we cannot transfer the money for your gigs! Read more: <1>how we handle payments and your information</1>.
stripe.step-2-text: You have entered your payment information but are not yet verified with our payment provider (Stripe).
stripe.step-2-pending: Your verification is pending, please check back later.
stripe.step-2-go-to-dashboard: Please visit your payment dashboard to complete your verification.

available-for-dates: Available for the dates you searched
